subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tomas Plekanec and Max Pacioretty scored 2 minutes 15 seconds apart in the second period as the Montreal Canadiens dealt the Islanders a 3-1 loss at Nassau Coliseum.
snippet: Tomas Plekanec and Max Pacioretty scored 2 minutes 15 seconds apart in the second period as the Montreal Canadiens dealt the Islanders a 3-1 loss at Nassau Coliseum.
